name: showdown-emoji
description: A Showdown extension for replacing emoji codes with images.
author: Bloggify <support@bloggify.org> (https://bloggify.org)

blah.description: This package uses [GitHub Emoji APIs](https://developer.github.com/v3/emojis/) to display the emojis in [Showdown](https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown) HTML outputs. :tada:
